data.prayer: Please, teach the 68,101 believers in Guang‘an, Sichuan, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Guang‘an, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Guang'an that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Guang'an. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Guang‘an, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Nosu, Mangbu people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please defend the 68,101 believers in Guang'an against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Guang'an access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary:
the county of Guang‘an, Sichuan, China has a population of 897,700.

We estimate Guang'an has 68,101 people who might know Jesus, 14,502 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 815,097 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Guang‘an, Sichuan, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

location.name: Guang'an
